    • parseAmount

      public static double parseAmount(String amountString) throws InvalidAmountException
      Tries to parse a string into a valid amount value
      Parameters:
      amountString - the string that will be parsed
      Returns:
      the double value the string represents
      Throws:
      InvalidAmountException - if string is blank or in the wrong format
